vistool theming utilities

vistool_theme.Rd

Lightweight theme model and helpers to manage plotting style in a single place.

Usage

vistool_theme(
  palette = "viridis",
  text_size = 11,
  theme = "minimal",
  alpha = 0.8,
  line_width = 1.2,
  point_size = 2,
  legend_position = "right",
  show_grid = TRUE,
  grid_color = "gray90",
  background = "white"
)

Arguments

palette

Character. Color palette to use. One of "viridis", "plasma", or "grayscale".

text_size

Numeric. Base text size for plots.

theme

Character. ggplot2 theme to use. One of "minimal", "bw", "classic", "gray", "grey", "light", "dark", or "void".

alpha

Numeric. Transparency level (0-1).

line_width

Numeric. Default line width for plots.

point_size

Numeric. Default point size for plots.

legend_position

Character. Position of legend. One of "top", "right", "bottom", "left", or "none".

show_grid

Logical. Whether to show grid lines.

grid_color

Character. Color of grid lines.

background

Character. Background color of plots.

Examples

th = vistool_theme(palette = "plasma", text_size = 12)
